explanation: [0-0] A man with a black beard wearing an orange T-shirt is sitting in front of a white table, holding a lit match in his right hand. On the table is a modified toy car. The background is a black curtain. At the top of the screen is written Fire Fighter Robot.

[0-3] A man with a black beard wearing an orange T-shirt sits in front of a white table, holding a match in his hand and placing it in front of a modified toy table. The toy car moves towards the match. The scene switches to a cement room where the man with the black beard is now wearing a white shirt and has a remote control strapped to his hand. He then reaches for the black stool in front of the screen, and the black stool moves towards him.
